page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: In Braunstone there are about 5,500 residential properties. Of these,454 are council owned. The Council also has 213 elderly persons' properties which include 1,2 and 3 bedroom bungalows and flats. The Council also owns 241 other properties including 1 and 2 bedroom flats and 2,3 and 4 bedroom houses. Some council properties are on Wilnicott Rd.,Kingsway North, and off Braunstone Lane. Most of the private houses around Ravenhurst were built between 193 and 1950. The majority of them are 3 or 4 bedroomed semi-detached houses. The average price of one of these houses inm 1985 is ?25,000. In a survey we found that most people lived in semi-detached houses ranging from 2 to 5 bedrooms. Most have 3 bedrooms.
